111.content:
One afternoon, Rogue walked through the halls of the X-Mansion, holding a package that had arrived for her that afternoon. "Finally, Ah was gettin' worried that it wouldn't come." She told herself. Unknown to the others, Rogue had secretly obtained an experimental mutant inhibitor collar. They were going to be used to help mutants with uncontrollable powers such as hers learn to control their powers. Despite this, the X-Men were concerned that the collars would also be used as weaponry against mutants. So far, Rogue had secretly tried using five collars but all of them had either short circuited or plain didn't work at all. "With any luck, this here collar'll help me get closer to Scott." she thought hopefully as she entered hers and Kitty's bedroom and unwrapped the collar. It was bright yellow with a red center for the clasp. Slowly, she put it on and activated it. "Now, Ah just need ta cover it up with a choker." she smiled as she grabbed one and slid it over her collar, effectively hiding it from sight. "An' now all I need is ta test it on someone..." Rogue remarked mentally as she looked outside and saw Kitty approaching her. "Hey, Kitty. Could ya help me?" She asked. "'Kay! What's up?" Kitty asked eagerly as she entered their bedroom. Rogue shut the door as Kitty plopped down onto her bed.

What happens next?

Rogue tells Kitty she needs to test out something she might've found to suppress her power

She tells Kitty that she needs to find out something

or

Something else

Take your pick!

info.description:
This is an interactive story. Each chapter tells a part of the story. When you reach a chapter that has yet to be written, feel free to make an addition.

Guidelines

I will allow sex to be described

The girls can wear and use diapers during sex

Weight gain will also be allowed if you want it to be.

I won't allow vore, male sex, racial slurs (except for 'Mutie' and other anti-mutant slurs), or anything else gross or rude.

Other than that, enjoy.
